lt.vtvpmc.java.postoffice

Interface PostOffice


  • public interface PostOffice
    PostOffice distributes packages.
    Author:
    ggrazevicius

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long numberOfPackagesForOwner(String owner)
      Counts the number of packages owned by the owner currently in the PostOffice.
      void postPackage(Package pkg)
      Posting the package adds it to PostOffice inventory.
      Package retrievePackage(String packageCode)
      Retrieves a package from PostOffice.

    • Method Detail

      • postPackage

        void postPackage(Package pkg)
          throws IllegalPackageException
        Posting the package adds it to PostOffice inventory. Once in the inventory package can be retrieved. Packages without a package code or owner should not be allowed to be posted. Not having package code or owner is having those values set to null or an empty string.
        Parameters:
        pkg -
        Throws:
        IllegalPackageException

      • numberOfPackagesForOwner

        long numberOfPackagesForOwner(String owner)
        Counts the number of packages owned by the owner currently in the PostOffice.
        Parameters:
        owner -
        Returns:

      • retrievePackage

        Package retrievePackage(String packageCode)
        Retrieves a package from PostOffice. PostOffice will remove the package from its inventory before returning it.
        Parameters:
        packageCode -
        Returns:
        package removed from PostOffice inventory, null if package is not found
